attributes.action: Sign this petition if you think there shouldn't be another Referendum on Brexit!
attributes.additional_details: We have won the vote to leave the European Union with a four percent margin occurring. This should not be taken away from us!
attributes.background: The people of Britain should not be allowed to vote again. What's done is done! We have made our decision to leave the European Union and now the people of Britain should be given what they rightfully deserve to have and that is; their own sovereignty and the right to take back control what is ours!
